document_data.mainbody:
Phalar was a drow Chosen of Vhaeraun.Erin M. Evans confirmed in [http//forum.candlekeep.com/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=18594&whichpage=1 a post] in the Candlekeep forum that he was a Chosen of Vhaeraun.
In 1486 DR, the disguised Dahl Peredur and Oota asked for Phalars help to sneak inside the keep of Adolican Rhand in order to free Farideh.
